sites.compiledCss: @media (min-width: 1024px) {.lg\:w-56 {width: 16rem!important;}.md\:w-75 {width: 19.75rem!important;}.container {max-width: 1450px!important;} }img.miko-shadow {border-radius: 5px!important; background-color: rgb(228, 228, 228)!important; border: 1px solid rgb(173, 173, 173)!important; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.55) 0px 0px 20px!important;}.docs-markdown code:not([class*="language-"]):not(.member-signature) {white-space: nowrap!important;}
